[Interface Components]

Base class for property widgets that provides a label and simple layout. More...

Detailed Description

Base class for property widgets that provides a label and simple layout.

DzError DzBasicPropertyWgt::addProperty ( DzProperty *  prop  )  [virtual]

Add a property to track.

Parameters:
prop The property to add to the list of properties controlled by this widget.
Returns:
DZ_NO_ERROR if the property was successfully added to the list of properties for the widget, otherwise, an error code.
